title: Devi Lakshmi Kasu Haaram - A Divine Embrace of Tradition
features: This Kasu Haaram showcases the revered Goddess Lakshmi, hand-engraved in intricate detail using the traditional Nakshi technique. Three floral pendants adorned with coral beads surround the goddess, creating a divine mandala. The necklace chain features meticulously set diamonds interspersed with ruby-studded paisley motifs (Manga Malai), all finished with our signature antique Hyderabadi polish for a vintage charm.
occasions: and other traditional Telugu festivities. Also a statement piece for upscale cultural events.
description: This Kasu Haaram is more than just jewelry; it's a symbol of prosperity and blessings. The hand-engraved Lakshmi motif carries immense cultural significance, making it a cherished heirloom. The combination of high-quality diamonds, rubies, and coral, along with expert craftsmanship, ensures lasting beauty and value.
